extensionDescription.message: Keep YouTube content in its original language: titles, descriptions, audio... No more unwanted translations.

popup_originalTitles_tooltip.message: Display original titles: Main video and browsing titles, notifications, channels (on main video page).

popup_audioTracks_tooltip.message: Switch to preferred audio track. Unfortunately, this feature is not available on the mobile version of YouTube for now (m.youtube.com).

popup_audioTracks_desktopOnly_title.message: This feature is only available on desktop browsers

popup_originalDescriptions_tooltip.message: Replace the translated description with the original one.

popup_originalThumbnails_tooltip.message: Replace translated thumbnails with original ones when browsing videos.

popup_subtitles_tooltip.message: Display subtitles in your preferred language (if available). If not, subtitles will be disabled. Auto generated subtitles are ignored.

popup_subtitles_asrToggle_tooltip.message: When enabled, if no manual subtitles are available in your preferred language, auto-generated (ASR) subtitles will be used instead, with translation if needed.

popup_extraSettings_youtubeDataApi.message: YouTube Data API v3 (API KEY NEEDED)
popup_extraSettings_youtubeDataApi.description: Title for YouTube Data API setting

popup_extraSettings_youtubeDataApi_toolt.message: Use YouTube Data API v3 to get original channel name & description and a fallback if other methods fails. Very reliable but requires your own API key. Your key is stored locally, only you can access it.
popup_extraSettings_youtubeDataApi_toolt.description: Tooltip for YouTube Data API setting

popup_extraSettings_youtubeDataApi_link.message: Get your free API key here
popup_extraSettings_youtubeDataApi_link.description: Link text for getting API key

popup_clearCache_title.description: Title attribute for clear cache button

popup_clearCache_clearedTabs.description: Button text after cache cleared with tab count

settings_audioTracks.description: Title for audio tracks in settings page

settings_audioTracks_tooltip.message: Always switch to preferred audio track. Unfortunately, this feature is not available on the mobile version of YouTube for now (m.youtube.com).
settings_audioTracks_tooltip.description: Tooltip for audio tracks in settings page

settings_originalDescriptions_tooltip.message: If description is translated, it will be replaced with the original description.
settings_originalDescriptions_tooltip.description: Tooltip for descriptions in settings page

settings_subtitles_tooltip.message: Display subtitles in your preferred language if available. If not, subtitles will be disabled. Auto generated subtitles are ignored by default.
settings_subtitles_tooltip.description: Tooltip for subtitles in settings page

settings_extraSettings_youtubeDataApi.description: Title for YouTube Data API in settings (no 'API KEY NEEDED')

settings_cacheManagement_tooltip.message: Clear cached titles and descriptions. Use this if you're experiencing incorrect content or want to start fresh.

settings_welcome_titleComplete.description: Complete welcome page title with extension name

settings_welcome_message.message: Thanks for installing YouTube No Translation! Here you can configure how the extension behaves.

settings_welcome_reloadNotice_text.message: For the extension to work on YouTube tabs that were already open before installation, you must reload those tabs.

settings_welcome_reloadButton.description: Button text to reload YouTube tabs

settings_footer_support.message: This extension is a one-person project made with passion. Your support helps me keep improving it â€” thank you! ðŸ’›
settings_footer_support.description: Footer support message in settings page

toast_title.message: Thanks for using YouTube No Translation!

toast_message.message: I maintain and improve this project on my own time. If you'd like to support future updates, you can do so on Ko-fi â€” your help truly makes a difference. ðŸ’Œ

toast_kofi_alt.description: Alt text for Ko-fi button image

toast_remindButton_title.message: You'll get another reminder next month

toast_dismissButton_title.message: You won't see this message again

toast_review_prefix.message: Can't afford a tip? You can still support me by leaving a 5-star review on
